about_the_game:
You are the last survivor of an army unit designed to contain the spread of zombies from a closed city.
You can't negotiate with zombies, you can't bribe or promise something in return, they will slowly but surely follow you wherever you go to destroy you.
It's impossible to hide from zombies, they always sense where you're hiding and will soon catch up with you.
The only way to escape is to destroy them first.
But it's not that easy, the city is full of traps.
Every corner or building could be hiding something deadly.
You'll die time after time, getting blown up by land mines, caught in traps or your flesh will be torn apart by zombies.
Remember everything you've learned from other survival games.
Look around every corner and remember, danger is waiting for you everywhere!

This is a very difficult game, you'll be ready to smash your keyboard against the monitor, when the hundredth time you carelessly blown up on the stretch, and you will always have only one life, and you can fill it only after defeating the boss and reaching the checkpoint. Reaching. After all, winning isn't everything.
For the hundredth time you'll understand why this game is called - Help me please!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence and blood, as well as scenes of limbs being torn off. Please note that this game is quite bloody, even though it looks like a cartoon.

detailed_description:
You are the last survivor of an army unit designed to contain the spread of zombies from a closed city.
You can't negotiate with zombies, you can't bribe or promise something in return, they will slowly but surely follow you wherever you go to destroy you.
It's impossible to hide from zombies, they always sense where you're hiding and will soon catch up with you.
The only way to escape is to destroy them first.
But it's not that easy, the city is full of traps.
Every corner or building could be hiding something deadly.
You'll die time after time, getting blown up by land mines, caught in traps or your flesh will be torn apart by zombies.
Remember everything you've learned from other survival games.
Look around every corner and remember, danger is waiting for you everywhere!

This is a very difficult game, you'll be ready to smash your keyboard against the monitor, when the hundredth time you carelessly blown up on the stretch, and you will always have only one life, and you can fill it only after defeating the boss and reaching the checkpoint. Reaching. After all, winning isn't everything.
For the hundredth time you'll understand why this game is called - Help me please!
name: Help me please

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: tel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: You can't negotiate with zombies, you can't bribe or promise something in return, they will slowly but surely follow you wherever you go to destroy you. It's impossible to hide from zombies, they always sense where you're hiding. The only way to escape is to destroy them first.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Portuguese - Portugal
